svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
May 18, 2024" date: "2024-05-18"
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, small fork targeting late 2024
* Dankrad Feist: benefits of Verkle , increase block size 10x, simplify node
architecture, reduce sync time, reduce node cost & enable path to light nodes
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* 🚨 Lido at 28.6% still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 28.6% still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1 Kiln went Geth free , 100% Nethermind Consensus layer:
Prysm 37% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1 Kiln went Geth free
* Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1
Lido 46.6% Geth at end of Q1
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
* Data Always: timing games as a service viz
Data Always: timing games as a service viz
* Piper Merriam: storing large SSZ objects in Portal Network to archive Ethereum’s
Piper Merriam: storing large SSZ objects in Portal Network to archive Ethereum’s state
* Nethermind (execution layer client) scaling roadmap via optimizations, Paprika,
Nethermind (execution layer client) scaling roadmap via optimizations, Paprika,
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.18.1 : hotfix to disable flood publishing for local
block builders with orphaned/missed block proposals
* Lodestar v1.18.1 : hotfix to disable flood publishing for local block builders with
* Execution layer: Besu v24.5.1 : snap sync server (early access) and receipt storage
size reduced Erigon v2.60.0 : last planned v2 release, fixes logs pruning issue in
* Besu v24.5.1 : snap sync server (early access) and receipt storage size reduced
Besu v24.5.1 : snap sync server (early access) and receipt storage size reduced
* Erigon v2.60.0 : last planned v2 release, fixes logs pruning issue in v2.59
Erigon v2.60.0 : last planned v2 release, fixes logs pruning issue in v2.59
* Degen & Apex rollups stopped posting batches for more than 24 hours after config
Degen & Apex rollups stopped posting batches for more than 24 hours after config
* User-defined penalties : proposal for preconf crypto-economic security
User-defined penalties : proposal for preconf crypto-economic security
* EIPs: EIP7706 : Separate gas type for calldata EIP7707 : Incentivize access list
provisioning EIP7708 : ETH transfers emit a log
* EIP7706 : Separate gas type for calldata
EIP7706 : Separate gas type for calldata
* EIP7708 : ETH transfers emit a log
EIP7708 : ETH transfers emit a log
* Hardhat v2.22.4 : adds BigInt task argument type
Hardhat v2.22.4 : adds BigInt task argument type
* Guide to Hardhat Ignition deployment using Ledger
Guide to Hardhat Ignition deployment using Ledger
* Heimdall-rs v0.8.0 : decompilation & decode improvements and more modular code base
Heimdall-rs v0.8.0 : decompilation & decode improvements and more modular code base
* Betherscan (browser extension): adds data fields to Etherscan, including block
header RLP, contract storage root, EOA nonce and transaction signature (v, r, s)
Betherscan (browser extension): adds data fields to Etherscan, including block header
RLP, contract storage root, EOA nonce and transaction signature (v, r, s)
* ERC5189 (account abstraction via endorsed operations) bundler : execute account
ERC5189 (account abstraction via endorsed operations) bundler : execute account
* Vitalik: proposal for MACI with votes offchain by default
Vitalik: proposal for MACI with votes offchain by default
* Sonne Finance (Compound v2 fork) ~$20M exploit on Optimism via known donation attack
Sonne Finance (Compound v2 fork) ~$20M exploit on Optimism via known donation attack
* Predy Finance ~$0.5M exploit on Arbitrum via a callback
Predy Finance ~$0.5M exploit on Arbitrum via a callback
* Vitalik: improving permissionlessness & decentralization in short/mid term , MEV,
Vitalik: improving permissionlessness & decentralization in short/mid term , MEV,
* Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 5 applications open
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 5 applications open
* EF Q1 grantees share $11M in funding
EF Q1 grantees share $11M in funding
* Etherscan contract statistics of most called functions & language versions
Etherscan contract statistics of most called functions & language versions
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.3 to 45.9 gwei, with 5.9 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 23.3 gwei 13k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.3 to 45.9 gwei, with 5.9 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
* Rune: Dai endgame , NewStable (USD pegged with real world asset collateral) &
Rune: Dai endgame , NewStable (USD pegged with real world asset collateral) & PureDai
* Words3 infinite live on Redstone, scrabble with fluctuating price letter tiles
Words3 infinite live on Redstone, scrabble with fluctuating price letter tiles
* Tornado Cash developer Alex Pertsev sentenced to 64 months in prison for money
Tornado Cash developer Alex Pertsev sentenced to 64 months in prison for money
* US Senate voted to repeal anti-crypto SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 that
US Senate voted to repeal anti-crypto SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 that precluded
* “Low carb crusader” brothers charged with wire fraud & conspiracy to commit money
laundering Reminder: MEV-Boost relay exploit on April 3, 2023 & low carb crusader
“Low carb crusader” brothers charged with wire fraud & conspiracy to commit money
* Reminder: MEV-Boost relay exploit on April 3, 2023 & low carb crusader disclosure
* P-256 hash-seed still hasn’t been found , RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile being added
P-256 hash-seed still hasn’t been found , RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile being added by
* RLN-v3 adds epoch-based message rate-limiting scheme
RLN-v3 adds epoch-based message rate-limiting scheme
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
* May 26 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 5 application deadline
May 26 – Ethereum Protocol Fellowship cohort 5 application deadline
* Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
* Oct 4-6 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
Oct 4-6 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
